name: Remnance
description:
The year is 2456. As a Trekker for S.A.L.V.A.G.E., the Sentinel Archive of Lost Valuables And Guarded Effects, you have been deployed to the newly discovered Halcian System. Being one of the first sentient lifeforms to visit the system in eons, your job is to catalog various relic sites across Halcian III, to learn more about the previous civilizations which inhabited the planet and why they disappeared.

Your handler is available to you via a communicator embedded in your wristwatch--your only link to the living on a planet seemingly devoid of life. But when he suddenly begins giving you questionable orders, you’ll have to decide for yourself whether or not disturbing the ruins of long forgotten civilizations is worth it.

Important Notice: This game is in its Beta release state, as such, there are still features that have yet to be implemented and a few minor bugs.
